plot: Feared, cursed and also admired, the same as its founder, in his life never defeated, the chieftain Genghis Khan. Mongolia, a magic country, searching for its present face in the heritage of the 13th century.
title: Mongolsko - V tieni Dzingischana
plot_es: Feared, cursed and also admired, the same as its founder, in his life never defeated, the chieftain Genghis Khan. Mongolia, a magic country, searching for its present face in the heritage of the 13th century.
plot_en: Feared, cursed and also admired, the same as its founder, in his life never defeated, the chieftain Genghis Khan. Mongolia, a magic country, searching for its present face in the heritage of the 13th century.
